casebody.data:
Roger Carl BERRY
v.
Theodis BECK, Secretary of Prison. No. 227P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2005. Roger Berry, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Theodis Beck, Secretary.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner on the 2nd day of May 2005 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Cumberland County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of May 2005."

Justice BRADY recused.
